response.original_title: Most Disturbed Person On Planet Earth
response.overview: "The footage you are about to see is an electronic documentation of the worlds most darkest, obscene and shocking media. This film has been created to prove that my infamous name is not a joke. I set out to create the most disturbing place of media in the world and believe I have succeeded."  Most Disturbed Person On Planet Earth (MDPOPE) is a mixtape created by "Thomas MD Cinemagore" that consists of real footage taken from the internet intending to shock the user.
response.tagline: 147 minutes of insanely disturbing shock footage, all combined into one single piece of media
response.title: Most Disturbed Person On Planet Earth
